alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 11:47AM CDT until March 27 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin. * WHEN...From this evening to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.2 feet, Road to access gage floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 14.5 feet Wednesday. It will then fall below flood stage Friday. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
